meanings.definition: A collection of various items or articles.
meanings.sent1: The antique shop had a miscellanea of old books, toys, and jewelry.
meanings.sent2: She rummaged through the miscellanea in the attic, finding forgotten treasures.
meanings.sent3: The miscellanea of mismatched socks in his drawer made him chuckle.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a miscellanea of memories, each one precious and unique.
meanings.sent5: The garage sale offered a colorful miscellanea of trinkets and knick-knacks.

meanings.sent1: The box contained a miscellanea of postcards, stamps, and letters.
meanings.sent2: The library had a section dedicated to the miscellanea of local authors.
meanings.sent3: His desk was a chaotic miscellanea of pens, paper clips, and sticky notes.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were a swirling miscellanea of ideas and inspirations.
meanings.sent5: The museum displayed a fascinating miscellanea of artifacts from different eras.
